result.purpose: This module is responsible for providing functionality to reverse strings.
result.architecture: The folder follows a simple structure with a main implementation file and corresponding test files, adhering to a modular design pattern.

hello/reverse/example_test.go.purpose: This file contains a test example for the reverse package, demonstrating the usage of the String function.

hello/reverse/reverse.go.purpose: This file provides a function to reverse strings.

hello/reverse/reverse_test.go.purpose: This file contains unit tests for the String function in the reverse package.
